Jewel Thief's Hood - Midnight (for Female)
kDesc
For when you meet up with the Thieves' Guild, where everyone knows everyone anyway! [#Legal]
Pour lorsque vous vous rassemblerez avec la Guilde des Voleurs, où tout le monde connait tout le monde de toutes façons! [#Legal]
Für deine Besuche in der Diebesgilde. Dort kennt dich sowieso jeder! [#Legal]
Per quando ti imbatti con la Gilda dei Ladri, dove tutti conoscono tutti! [#Legal]
Prenda para no desentonar en las reuniones del gremio de ladrones, donde ya se sabe que las apariencias lo son todo. [#Legal]
어찌되었건 서로 서로 모두 알고 있는 도둑들의 협회에 갈 때 필요할 겁니다! [#Legal]
For when you meet up with the Thieves' Guild, where everyone knows everyone anyway! [#Legal]
專門在參加江洋大盜聚會時穿著，不管怎樣，大家都相互認識。 [#Legal]
專門在參加江洋大盜聚會時穿著，不管怎樣，大家都相互認識。 [#Legal]
For when you meet up with the Thieves' Guild, where everyone knows everyone anyway! [#Legal]
